text: These are the official results of the Men's Shot Put event at the 1993 IAAF World Championships in Stuttgart, Germany. There were a total number of 32 participating athletes, with the final held on Saturday August 21, 1993. The qualification mark was set at 20.00 metres. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Werner Günthör Switzerland (SUI) |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Randy Barnes United States (USA) |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Oleksandr Bagach Ukraine (UKR) |} ==Schedule== *All times are Central European Time (UTC+1) {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- !colspan="2"|Qualification Round |- !Group A !Group B |- |20.08.1993 - 11:45h |20.08.1993 - 11:45h |- !colspan="2"|Final Round |- |colspan="2"|21.08.1993 - 18:15h |} ==Abbreviations== *All results shown are in metres {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center; font-size:110%;" width="35%" |- |bgcolor="ccffcc"| Q || automatic qualification |- |bgcolor="ddffdd"| q || qualification by rank |- |DNS || did not start |- |NM || no mark |- |WR || world record |- |AR || area record |- |NR || national record |- |PB || personal best |- |SB || season best |} ==Records== {| class="wikitable" style=" text-align:center;
